title: A novel extraction method for three ochratoxins in human urine based on polystyrene/polyethersulfone electrospun nanofibers coated with copper nanoparticles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27972-27979
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04670F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lanling Chu, Yuqi Dai, Chen Hou, Xuejun Kang, Qianqian Jiang, Xiaoman Jiang, Jing Li, Hongyu Qin
Preparation of PS/PES-CuNP nanofibers followed by packed-fiber solid-phase extraction for three ochratoxins in human urine was performed, and thus, a novel analytical method was developed.
